Right here behind me in the
Jewish quarter of Baghdad,

an event called Farhud occurred
here on June 1st, 1941,

it was a huge pogrom against
the Jewish population;
900 of these homes were destroyed,
180 Jews were killed,

and thousands of them
were injured right here.

It's so sad to see these
